name: Uklymbem - A Grappling Hook Game
description:
Summary

Alone in the woods, with nothing but your trusty grappling hook by your side, you must swing to place the sun back in the sky

Controls

A/D - move left/right

W/S (when hooked) - reel the hook in and out

Left Click - shoot grappling hook

Space - jump/unhook

Left Shift - slow down time

E (when hooked) - zip towards the hook

Created By

Luke Quirion

Fen Cullen

Evie Baur

Anika Olivo

Claudia Jodlowski
